text: Apani balunah ami tomaderake bali na ye, amara kache allahara bhandara rayeche. Tachara ami adrsya bisaya abagata'o na'i. Ami emana bali na ye, ami pheresata. Ami to sudhu ai ohira anusarana kari, ya amara kache ase. Apani bale dinah andha o caksumana ki samana hate pare? Tomara ki cinta kara na
